universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Interface CalendarView.OnMonthChangeListener

  • Enclosing class:
    CalendarView

    public static interface CalendarView.OnMonthChangeListener
    Listener that can receive callback about changed month by scroll within CalendarView.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMonthChanged(CalendarView calendarView, int month)
      Invoked whenever the specified month has been changed within the given calendarView due to change in the scroll.
      void onMonthScrolled(CalendarView calendarView, int month, float offset)
      Invoked whenever the specified month (its view) has been scrolled within the given calendarView.

    • Method Detail

      • onMonthScrolled

        void onMonthScrolled(@NonNull
                     CalendarView calendarView,
                     int month,
                     float offset)
        Invoked whenever the specified month (its view) has been scrolled within the given calendarView.
        Parameters:
        calendarView - The calendar view where the month has been scrolled.
        month - The month number of which view has been scrolled.
        offset - Offset of the scrolled month view from its 'idle' position. Value is from the range [0.0, 1.0) where 0.0 indicates that the month view is completely scrolled to the left (it is not visible for a user) and 1.0 indicates that the month view is completely scrolled at its 'idle' position (it is fully visible for a user).

      • onMonthChanged

        void onMonthChanged(@NonNull
                    CalendarView calendarView,
                    int month)
        Invoked whenever the specified month has been changed within the given calendarView due to change in the scroll.
        Parameters:
        calendarView - The calendar view where the month has been changed.
        month - The changed month number from the range [Calendar.JANUARY, Calendar.DECEMBER].
